      • releaseControllerInstance

        Overrides:

      • powerOnIcc

        public void powerOnIcc(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Power on the contact card for APDU exchange. By default, the device will communicate to the contact card slot if an empty Hashtable or no Hashtable is provided.

        Callback:
        MiscController.MiscDelegate.onPowerOnIccStatusReceived(boolean, String, String, int),

        Parameters:
        data - hashtable key and value

        ICC_SLOT Specified the SAM slot number to communicate to.
        0 - IC card slot
        1 - SAM slot one

      • powerOffIcc

        public void powerOffIcc()
        Power off the contact card after APDU exchange.

        Callback:
        MiscController.MiscDelegate.onPowerOffIccStatusReceived(boolean).

      • sendApdu

        public void sendApdu(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Send plaintext SAM / encrypted ICC Level 1 APDU command to card.

        Callback:
        MiscController.MiscDelegate.onApduStatusReceived(boolean, Hashtable).

        Parameters:
        data - hashtable key and value ICC_APDU APDU command
        ICC_APDU_LEN APDU command length

      • startNfcDetection

        public void startNfcDetection(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Start the NFC card detection.
        To cancel listening for card, call stopNfcDetection(Hashtable).

        Callback:
        onNfcDetectCardStatusReceived(NfcDetectCardStatus, Hashtable),
        onVasStatusReceived(VASStatus, Hashtable).

        Parameters:
        data - hashtable key and values.

        NFC_CARD_DETECTION_TIMEOUT : Indicate the detect card timeout, in second.
        NFC_OP_MODE : Indicate the operation mode. Default is NFC_OP_DEFAULT

        NFC_OP_DEFAULT - Default
        NFC_OP_MIFARE_RW - MIFARE Read-Write
        NFC_OP_DESFIRE_PASSTHRU - MIFARE DESFire


      • stopNfcDetection

        public void stopNfcDetection(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Stop the NFC card detection.

        Callback:
        onNfcDetectCardStatusReceived(NfcDetectCardStatus, Hashtable)

        Parameters:
        data - hashtable key and value

      • nfcDataExchange

        public void nfcDataExchange(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Read or write NDEF record.

        Callback:
        MiscController.MiscDelegate.onNfcDataExchangeStatusReceived(boolean, Hashtable)

        Parameters:
        data - hashtable key and value

        NFC_READ_NDEF : Indicate the read option, see ReadNdefRecord}.
        NFC_WRITE_NDEF : Indicate the data to be written, in hex string NDEF format.

        NFC_MIF_CARDKEY : MIFARE card key in hex string, 6/8/16 bytes
        NFC_MIF_CARDKEY_NUMBER : MIFARE card key number in HEX string
        NFC_MIF_CARDBLK_NUMBER : Block number in HEX string
        NFC_MIF_CARD_DATA_LEN : Data length to be read from card in HEX string
        NFC_MIF_CARDCMD : Command send to MIFWARE card e.g. C0 - Transfer
        NFC_MIF_CARDCMD_DATA : Data use with the NFC_MIF_CARDCMD

        NFC_MIF_DF_CARD_AID : Application ID of the MIFARE DESFire card, in hex string.
        NFC_MIF_DF_CARD_FID : File ID of the MIFARE DESFire card, in hex string.
        NFC_MIF_DF_FILE_OFFSET : File offset of the MIFARE DESFire card, in hex string.
